name: Orb Collider
description:
Created in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam by Ben Wimsett (BWDev). Theme: Joined Together.

Had a lot of fun with this theme! Hope you all enjoy the game. Ratings and feedback always welcome :)

Orb Collider

Using a limited number of tethers, destroy all of the orbs in the level through collision.

Controls

- Click and drag from an orb to create a tether. Release on another orb to pull the orbs together.

- Info about mechanics can be found by clicking the " I" icon in-game.
